Rulings.Base: 1. "Lightsworn Barrier" targets your opponent's attacking monster.\n2. Sending two cards from the top of your Deck to the GY is a cost.

PSCT.Edison: ① If your "Lightsworn" monster is targeted for an attack: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then target the attacking monster; negate the attack.
PSCT.Tengu:
① If your "Lightsworn" monster is targeted for an attack: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then target the attacking monster; 
negate the attack.
